statements: SELECT student_id, date, status FROM StudentAttendance;
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT student_id, date FROM StudentAttendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) AS Count FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY status;
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT student_id, date, status FROM StudentAttendance;
SELECT date, status, student_id FROM StudentAttendance WHERE status='Present';
SELECT * FROM StudentAttendance ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS attendance_count FROM StudentAttendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT student_id, date, status FROM StudentAttendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_id FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM attendance ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT student_id, date, status FROM attendance WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, status FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id;
SELECT student_name, date FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id WHERE attendance.status = 'Present';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM attendance WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM students WHERE is_present = TRUE;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id JOIN courses ON attendance.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS course_count FROM attendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT MAX(attendance_date) AS latest_date FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE is_present = TRUE ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, attendance_date FROM students WHERE attendance_date >= '2022-01-01' AND attendance_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = 'ee90a6c8-af7c-4318-ae87-d1b5a0cf6444' OR course_id = 'd53c5d31-8d23-45a0-b16c-7e9c4a9fd416';

SELECT student_name, attendance_date, attendance_status FROM students s JOIN attendance a ON s.student_id = a.student_id WHERE a.course_id = 'ee90a6c8-af7c-4318-ae87-d1b5a0cf6444' ORDER BY attendance_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM attendance a JOIN courses c ON a.course_id = c.course_id WHERE a.attendance_status = 'Absent';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE student_email = 'example@example.com';
SELECT course_name, course_id FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT student_name, status FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students INNER JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 5;
SELECT course_name, status FROM Courses INNER JOIN Attendance ON Courses.course_id = Attendance.course_id WHERE date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT teacher_name, status, date FROM Teachers INNER JOIN Attendance ON Teachers.teacher_id = Attendance.course_id WHERE status = 'Absent';

SELECT student_name, course_name, status FROM Students INNER JOIN Courses ON Students.student_id = Courses.course_id INNER JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE date = '2022-01-01' AND status = 'Absent';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, name, age FROM students WHERE age > 15;
SELECT class_name, teacher FROM classes WHERE teacher LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT student_id, grade, subject FROM grades WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT teacher_name, email FROM teachers WHERE department = 'Science';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM students WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT classes.class_name, teachers.teacher_name FROM classes INNER JOIN teachers ON classes.teacher = teachers.teacher_name;
SELECT students.name, attendance.date, attendance.status FROM students INNER JOIN attendance ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id ORDER BY attendance.date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT students.name, grades.grade, grades.subject FROM students INNER JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grades.subject LIKE '%Math%' ORDER BY grades.grade DESC;
